article_title: Rep. Steve Stivers on the Chances for Tax Reform
article_text:
To give midmarket companies more of a voice in government, U.S. Rep. Steve Stivers, an Ohio Republican, helped form a bipartisan group called the Congressional Caucus for Middle Market Growth. Gerald F. Seib, Washington bureau chief of The Wall Street Journal, interviewed Rep. Stivers about issues important to the group. Edited excerpts follow.

MR. SEIB: What are the top issues you guys are pursuing? Give me the shortlist.

...

twitter.description: Ohio Republican, speaking at The Wall Street Journal’s Middle Market conference, says the best hope for action is after the presidential election.

article_summary:
Gerald F. Seib, Washington bureau chief of The Wall Street Journal, interviewed Rep. Stivers about issues important to the group.
To give midmarket companies more of a voice in government, U.S. Rep. Steve Stivers, an Ohio Republican, helped form a bipartisan group called the Congressional Caucus for Middle Market Growth.
MR. SEIB: What are the top issues you guys are pursuing?
Give me the shortlist.
Edited excerpts follow.
